post_title: T206 Red Ty Cobb Factory 42 Scroll Sweet Caporal SGC 4
post_content:
Hi guys. Offering my T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait with a pretty rare Factory 42 Scroll Sweet Caporal back. It’s more rare than Polar Bear. SGC 4. Amazing color and centering. Asking 13k obo. Ships directly from my PWCC vault. Plenty of references as well. Thanks!

Larry Cohen
610 fourtwozero 28four9 if you want to text or call.
